      Parameters:
      player - The player to teleport
      farthestTpDistance - The farthest distance to teleport a player from another player

    • getMessage

      java.lang.String getMessage​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String... variables)
      Get a plugin message with the path specified in messages.yml
      Parameters:
      path - the path of the message
      variables - the variables to fill in if this is left blank, then they will be represented as $1, $2, etc.
      Returns:
      String the message with color codes translated
